description: A perfect course for the kid to start their journey. Its a place to introduce you children with drawing, shape and also colors. This is the very begining to be a amazing artist.

Animation is not the art of making drawings move, but the art of drawing movement. Based on the persistence of vision, animation,is an illusion of fluid movement.

Drawing is a fundamental object of creativity in the process of re-construction and change typical of this period. A entusiast biggener can start this one bliend. If anyone has miniaml drawing knowledge.
A freehand drawing is drawn without using instruments such as a ruler or a pair of compasses. You need some perfect knowledges of pencil strokes for free hand.
Cartoon, originally, and still, a full-size sketch or drawing used as a pattern for a tapestry, painting, mosaic, or other graphic art form, but also, since the early 1840s.
Pofessional artists convey a specific thought or feeling through artistic media such as photography, painting, sculpting and illustration.
A portrait artist captures the intimate likeness of a person on paper, canvas, or another surface, as a sculpture, photograph, painting, or another medium altogether.
